entry.title: Sines of Life 78: Zig-Zag
entry.content:
My first compilation since my last Livestream, I had almost forgotten what it was like to get ‚Äúunlimited tries‚Äù to hit each transition üòù But in all seriousness, it‚Äôs been quite relaxing getting back to producing at my own pace, and having the extra downtime for some much needed R&R.

Enough about me! This month‚Äôs mix pulls from all corners of the proverbial map, featuring Jody Wisternoff, Nora en Pure, Qrion, Galantis, and a nice Trance section with a new mashup from yours truly. All that, plus a very groovy little remix of the current zeitgeist-anthem ‚ÄòHouse Arrest‚Äô by Sofi Tukker, and we‚Äôve got ourselves a mixtape.

Enjoy, and turn it up‚Ä¶


Download this mix.


SOUNDCLOUD


Tracklist

  1. Elderbrook - Numb (Elderbrook VIP Mix)
  2. Sultan + Shepard, The Boxer Rebellion - Keep Moving (Sultan + Shepard Reboot)
  3. DJ Antoine feat. Eric Zayne, Jimmi The Dealer - Loved Me Once (DJ Antoine vs Mad Mark 2k19 Extended Mix)
  4. Jody Wisternoff - Emochine
  5. Sofi Tukker & Gorgon City - House Arrest (Chris Lorenzo Extended Mix)
  6. Galantis, Dolly Parton feat. Mr. Probz - Faith (feat. Mr. Probz) (Galantis & Bali Bandits VIP Mix)
  7. Nora En Pure - Fibonacci (Original Club Mix)

  10. Motez, Qrion - Slow Down
  11. Tinlicker - Blackbirds (Extended Mix)
  12. Luttrell - Some Other Time

  14. Spencer Brown & Qrion - Foggy August (Original Mix)
  15. Matt Fax - Collide (Original Mix)
  16. Moon Boots - So Precious (DJ Clea Remix)
  17. Seven Lions feat. Ellie Goulding - Don‚Äôt Leave (Radio Mix)
  18. NERVO feat. Avicii - You‚Äôre Gonna Love Again (Robin Rocks & Rubio Remix)
  19. Armin van Buuren & Sharon den Adel - In And Out Of Love (ilan Bluestone & Maor Levi Remix)
  20. Alex Sonata vs. Clean Bandit - The Tears Stay feat. Linnea Schossow and Louisa Johnson (Lifesine Dual-boot)

  24. Siks - Your Love (Original Mix)

entry.title: Sines of Life 77: Happy Endings (Livestream #10)
entry.content:
Going out with a bang with the final official Lifesine Livestream of the Summer, Happy Endings delivers a hearty helping of the all the fist-pumping dancefloor classics, pop bops, and 80‚Äôs and 90‚Äôs throwbacks you‚Äôve come to expect. You know when you‚Äôre mixing Eiffel 65 into Kim Petras, you‚Äôre doing something right, so move that coffee table and get ready to dance!

Enjoy, and turn it up‚Ä¶


Download this mix.

entry.title: Sines of Life 76: Circular Symmetry (Livestream #09)
entry.content:
Original video and a slightly more polished audio version of Livestream #09. I had fun with this one looping some nice vocal licks while mixing out of Melodic House, so listen for along with numerous earworms from favorites Spencer Brown, Ben B√∂hmer, Le Youth, Tinlicker, Moon Boots, Yotto, and more.

Circular Symmetry will take you for a ride, and back again ‚Äì so enjoy, and turn it up‚Ä¶


Download this mix.

entry.title: Sines of Life 75: Strata (Livestream #08)
entry.content:
Continuing the recent trend of out-of-order posts, here‚Äôs yesterday‚Äôs Livestream Recording, releasing ahead of the recording from 2 weeks back (shame on me!)

Nevertheless, Strata heaps on layers of Progressive House and Vocal Trance for synthy feels, and just enough upbeat Dance and Electro Swing to keep you moving in between. A handful of tracks each from the likes of Above & Beyond, Spencer Brown, Galantis, and many more.

Enjoy, and turn it up‚Ä¶


Download this mix.

entry.title: Sines of Life 74: The Lost Mix

link.title: Sines of Life 74: The Lost Mix

entry.content:
A lovely 74th installment of Sines of Life Radio to celebrate an equally delightful 7/4 Holiday Weekend! üá∫üá∏

I originally started work on this mix back in February ‚Äì¬†that far-away time before masks, shelter-in-place, and Livestreams‚Ä¶ things admittedly got a little weird, and this gem of a mix got ‚Äúlost‚Äù in the shuffle. Now it‚Äôs finally been found & finished, sporting the satisfying sounds of Satin Jackets, Meduza, David Guetta, Madeon, and many more.

So, raise a glass, or a flag (or both), and as always ‚Äì Enjoy, and turn it up‚Ä¶

Download this mix.


Lifesine ¬∑ Sines of Life 74: The Lost Mix

  1. Spencer Brown, Liam Hathaway - LA ID

entry.title: Sines of Life 73: Buffer Overflow (Livestream #05)
entry.content:
I hope everyone‚Äôs gearing up for a nice long holiday weekend. We‚Äôre doing a bit of time-travel with this release, working backwards to deliver more music from the backlog as promised with the audio recording from Livestream #05 on June 5th!

Don‚Äôt forget, you can always catch the original video replay on my YouTube Channel for the full visual experience üòâ

entry.title: Sines of Life 72: Genre (Livestream #06)
entry.content:
Experience several meandering movements in Genre, from Pop to Progressive, and some Big Room for good measure. Grade-A entertainment from a range of cast members, including Mat Zo, Lizzo, and a delightful opener from CRJ‚Äôs stellar ‚ÄòSide B‚Äô, plus some relative oldies from Andrew Bayer and Bob Sinclar.

I‚Äôm simplifying from here on out, and releasing Livestream recordings as directly Sines of Life installments as they come, so catch the audio on Soundcloud, as well as the full Video Replay from 6/18/20 on YouTube below!

While it may go without saying at this point ‚Äì enjoy, and turn it up‚Ä¶

Download this mix.

entry.title: üíØ (The Babeh Mix)
entry.content:
Pretty crazy to think that in a COVID-free parallel dimension somewhere, I‚Äôd be getting married today. Since that seems not to be the plan, I‚Äôm getting creative with how I celebrate with my special lady. With that in mind, I share with all of you this perfectly personalized ‚ÄúBabeh Mix‚Äù, crafted especially for my amazing partner. üíØ minutes of üíØ% fun tracks she loves, or that say how I feel about her ‚Äì not just because it‚Äôs her favorite emoji, but because she‚Äôs üíØ, and she deserves nothing less.

Love you, Babeh üíú

And to the rest of you, enjoy this very special release, and of course ‚Äì turn it up‚Ä¶


Download this mix, and celebrate with us (remotely).

entry.title: Sines of Life 71: Kaleidoscope (Livestream #04)
entry.content:
By popular demand, last Friday‚Äôs Quarantine Livestream is now consumable as this month‚Äôs Sines of Life Radio! It feels a bit like cheating to turn a live set into the monthly mixtape, but I‚Äôm puttin‚Äô in the work either way, so you might as well get both flavors üòâ

Lot‚Äôs of extended transitions, giving the whole set a semi-mashup vibe. Eclectic as always, we‚Äôve got Jason Ross, Rita Ora, London Grammar, a pair of feel-good tracks from RAC, and much more.

You can also check out the Video Replay of Livestream #04 if you want the full show.

Enjoy, and turn it up‚Ä¶

Download this mix.

entry.title: Livestream #04 Replay
entry.content:
May 22, 2020

Our bi-weekly Livestream Quaran-tainment continues! Join me for another eclectic selection of tracks, plus my rather colorful shirt-choice from this week. And as always..

Enjoy, and turn it up‚Ä¶
